Text:
GregBrooks, I love you!!!
Thanks for all the Queen remasters.
Being a Queen fan since 1976 I own all their stuff across different formats (original vinyl, 1st CD releases, Hollywood re-releases, the lot) but I just couldn't get myself over spending money at "another copy of something I already own".
So, again, thanks a lot
thx for all the uploads greg!
Yes, thanks alot for these excellent remasters, very much appreciated, all the best
EXCELLENT recording. Good FreqResp well past 20k, tu Mr. GregBrooks
